titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of September 29 as National Urban Wildlife Refuge Day.
Expressing support for the designation of September 29 as National Urban Wildlife Refuge Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of National Urban Wildlife Refuge Day.
Affirms support for the Urban Wildlife Conservation Program within the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service.
